EmailTemplate.description: when form is Initated send email to appraisee
EmailTemplate.name: Initated Appraisal Cycle
EmailTemplate.subject: Initated Appraisal Cycle
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Initated Appraisal Cycle
Dear {!AppraiseeName} ,
You are Succesfully Initated the Appraisal form for the current cycle {CycleName}. Please fill the form with accurate details and submit to the Appraiser{AppraiserName} within the corresponding {enddate}.
Thank & Regards,
KRIYA(PMS)
